meanings.meaning: 1. to hold (in one's hand); to take; to carry コートを持ちましょうか。Shall I carry your coat?

meanings.meaning: 2. to possess; to have; to own ＡＢＣ海外旅行障害保険を持っています。I'm a holder of ABC Travel Insurance.

7. to have "it"; to have that special something; to be blessed with good luck Colloquial, esp. as 持ってる

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 1. having; holding; possessing; owning; using; holder; owner; user 腰痛持ちです。I have back problems.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to bring (news, knowledge, etc.); to introduce Usually written using kana alone彼は私たちに悲しい知らせをもたらした。He brought us sad news.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to bring about; to cause; to produce (e.g. results) Usually written using kana alone科学は私達の生活に多くの変化をもたらした。Science has brought about many changes to our lives.
齎す: Rarely-used kanji form.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to bring (news, knowledge, etc.); to introduce Usually written using kana alone彼は私たちに悲しい知らせをもたらした。He brought us sad news.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to bring about; to cause; to produce (e.g. results) Usually written using kana alone科学は私達の生活に多くの変化をもたらした。Science has brought about many changes to our lives.

sentences.translation: Science has brought about many changes to our lives.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to treat (a guest); to receive; to entertain; to be hospitable to; to make welcome Usually written using kana alone
持て成す: Rarely-used kanji form.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to treat (a guest); to receive; to entertain; to be hospitable to; to make welcome Usually written using kana alone
持て成す: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. to be able to possess (hold, get, etc.) See also 持つ
2. to be well liked; to be popular; to be pampered (spoiled, doted upon, etc.); to be welcomed See also モテる
3. to endure (the tests of time, the elements, etc.); to last
4. possessed; held 彼はもてる物すべてを失った。He lost his all.
5. rich; wealthy; affluent
1. to be able to possess (hold, get, etc.) See also 持つ
2. to be well liked; to be popular; to be pampered (spoiled, doted upon, etc.); to be welcomed See also モテる
3. to endure (the tests of time, the elements, etc.); to last
4. possessed; held 彼はもてる物すべてを失った。He lost his all.
5. rich; wealthy; affluent
1. hot topic; talk of the town
持ち切り 【もちきり】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to take out; to carry out; to bring out from where it belongs この棚の本を持ち出すな。Don't take out the books on this shelf.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to mention something; to broach a topic; to bring up (a subject); to raise (an issue); to mention それは食事の席の会話で持ち出すのに適当ではない。That is not a proper subject to bring up in conversation at the dinner table.
持出す 【もちだす】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to take out; to carry out; to bring out from where it belongs この棚の本を持ち出すな。Don't take out the books on this shelf.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to mention something; to broach a topic; to bring up (a subject); to raise (an issue); to mention それは食事の席の会話で持ち出すのに適当ではない。That is not a proper subject to bring up in conversation at the dinner table.
持出す 【もちだす】

sentences.translation: Don't take out the books on this shelf.
That is not a proper subject to bring up in conversation at the dinner table.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to bring in; to take in; to carry in これは機内に持ち込めますか。Can I carry this on the plane?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to approach (someone) with (a proposal, offer, problem, etc.); to bring; to lodge (a complaint); to propose (e.g. a project)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to bring (to another stage); to take (e.g. to court, to extra time, to a play-off) 私は妥協を許さずに希望していた通りの契約に持ち込んだ。I stood my ground and got the contract I wanted.
持ちこむ 【もちこむ】、持込む 【もちこむ】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
